body:
> We have found reproducible errors at Firefox startup related to recipe enrollment, see here:
> 
> https://pastebin.com/raw/qrLSPz3m
> 
> https://pastebin.com/raw/6cWR5cRW

The second pastebin here is #1058 and the fix is being uplifted in [bug 1399245](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1399245). @mythmon and I looked into it this morning and we think that it should not affect enrollment (it fails at the end of initializing the preference experiment, and the method that isn't found is also called when the add-on shuts down).
body_text:
We have found reproducible errors at Firefox startup related to recipe enrollment, see here:
https://pastebin.com/raw/qrLSPz3m
https://pastebin.com/raw/6cWR5cRW

The second pastebin here is #1058 and the fix is being uplifted in bug 1399245. @mythmon and I looked into it this morning and we think that it should not affect enrollment (it fails at the end of initializing the preference experiment, and the method that isn't found is also called when the add-on shuts down).
body_html:
We have found reproducible errors at Firefox startup related to recipe enrollment, see here:

https://pastebin.com/raw/qrLSPz3m

https://pastebin.com/raw/6cWR5cRW

The second pastebin here is #1058 and the fix is being uplifted in bug 1399245. @mythmon and I looked into it this morning and we think that it should not affect enrollment (it fails at the end of initializing the preference experiment, and the method that isn't found is also called when the add-on shuts down).
